body.name: Peg Perego Viaggio Shuttle - Booster Car Seat - for Children from 40 to 120 lbs - Made in Italy - Licorice (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 6 hrs 7 mins
features: Made In Italy. Holds up to 120 lbs with a maximum height of 63 inches
Has an integrated Rigid latch which makes it easy to place in car and keeps booster secure when child is not present
The integrated rigid latch can slide back into the booster, allowing it to easily be used in vehicles without latch
Integrated rigid latch contains our exclusive Blind Lock System, which protects the seat from inadvertent release
body.description: Growing children will get a boost in safety with the Viaggio Shuttle. An Integrated Rigid latch system allows for the Shuttle to connect to the vehicle latch anchors for perfect placement. If a vehicle does not have anchors, the Integrated Rigid latch can be pushed back into the booster, making it simple to use in any vehicle. A cup holder is included for quick drink access during rides. The cushion of the Viaggio Shuttle includes a super layer of soft urethane foam, keeping bottoms comfortable on long journeys. The Viaggio Shuttle comes equipped with a carry handle and adjustable shoulder clip, making it easy to use while on the go. Make safety a priority for growing children with the Viaggio Shuttle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dual Layer Comfort Ideal for long journeys, the Viaggio Shuttle 120 is designed to be extremely comfortable thanks to its double layer of expanded material. Carry Handle A carry handle is located on the rear of the Viaggio Shuttle 120 for easy transportation. Cup Holder A clip-on cup holder is included with the Viaggio Shuttle 120. Blind Lock Attaching System Prevents the Viaggio Shuttle 120 from being accidentally released by another passanger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tesla recommended this booster for the Model Y. I had never heard of this brand prior. The booster feels solid but not heavy. I particularly like the way the clamps retract into the booster and allow for a secure fit to the car attachment points. It’s easy to install and remove. My 10 year old says its comfortable. I liked this so much I bought a second one for Dad’s car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This booster seat is so easy to install and remove . Fits perfectly in the back seat and does not cover the seat belt. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a high quality booster seat with zero hassle to latch and unlatch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe, cool looking and fits Tesla Model 3
reviews.reviewText: I tried a few car seat boosters and Peg Perego is the only one that fit very nicely into the Tesla Model 3. The kids can buckle themselves with no issues. The booster safely connects with a clip in system so that there is no slipping and sliding. Also, a huge bonus is that the boosters look very cool which I cant say about anything else out there that I have looked at.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: I have had many booster seats over the years and this is by far the nicest.Pros:Easy to installLow profileComfortable for my 6 year oldDoes not budge once installedCons:PriceyMust be installed in a seat with the latch connectors which limits placementOverall I would never buy another booster seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best booster seat, period.
reviews.reviewText: I am one of those crazy safety moms that kept her kid in a carseat then high back booster for as long as I could. Too many people transition their kids out of these safety measures too soon. Regardless of how old your child is, maintaining car seat safety is essential and depends on your child's height and weight, in my opinion. When the high back booster became too uncomfortable for my 58 lb 4'8" 10yo I began contemplating the no back booster, unfortunately all the no back boosters I looked at slid around the back seat and while they would have lifted my child so that she could appropriately use the in car seat belt, it was actually less safe in keeping her in place. Then I found the Peg Perago Viaggio Shuttle.The major difference between the Peg Perago Viaggio Shuttle and all other no-back boosters are the integrated rigid latch system. These are the two metal arms that anchor the booster to your car. NO OTHER NO BACK BOOSTER HAS THIS. I bought this booster for this reason alone and I was not disappointed. No more sliding around and I have the piece of mind in knowing that my kid is safe in the event of a car accident.As for comfort, my older kid was happy not to have to be restricted to her 90 degree high back booster, so plus there. Unfortunately the seat leaves much to be desired in the way of padding, she says. This wasn't enough to deter me from buying this and we will just have her sit on a towel for long drives.I feel like the price is definitely more than comparable boosters but you pay for what you get.I am thoroughly satisfied with my purchase and would definitely recommend it to others looking for a booster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cup holder not stable?
reviews.reviewText: This seat is a great booster where it is narrow enough for my child to put on her seatbelt herself. It is also super easy to install and remove. The only complaint I have is the swiveling cup holder. I had to clean up water and juice spillage because of this swivel cup. It's so annoying. She doesn't use the cup holder anymore for drinks so it's OK.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, very simple to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME CAR SEAT!
reviews.reviewText: Love this! It was time to put my daughter in a booster seat and I didn’t like all the other ones. Then I found this one. I love how it anchors to the seat the a regular car seat would. Very safe.
Muy buena silla para niños. Calidad y precio excelente. Ademas el diseño es muy bonito. Se ancla muy facil.

El producto está bien hecho, es de buena calidad y se instala y desinstala fácilmente... mi calificación es porque justo donde queda el broche del coche el asiento tiene un hecho.... y ahí se esconde el broche del coche y es casi imposible abrocharlo
